message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product, I think you'll find it very useful. I'm asking $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, but $200 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $160?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
